text: "Comfortable" is a song by American rapper K Camp for his debut studio album Only Way Is Up. It was released on June 9, 2015 as the album's second single. "Comfortable" has since peaked at number 54 on the Billboard Hot 100. The official remix features Akon and 50 Cent. == Commercial performance == In the United States, "Comfortable" peaked at number 54 on the Billboard Hot 100 on the issue dated September 26, 2015.http://www.billboard.com/artist/6055630/k-camp/chart == Music video == The song's music video features K Camp at Punta Cana, Dominican Republic. In the video, K Camp is shown with his love interest, with a Handycam to capture their vacation moments. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !scope="col"| Chart (2015) !scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ==Certifications== == References == == External links == Category:2015 singles Category:2015 songs Category:K Camp songs Category:Interscope Records singles
title: Comfortable (song)
